channel.title: Item.cfg problem: berserker ring's stats dont work
channel.description:
my item.cfg for berserker ring it3m = 6737 Berserker_Ring A_ring_reputed_to_bring_out_a_berserk_fury_in_its_wearer. 6000 6000 8000 0 0 4 0 0 0 0 4 0 0 4 0
i noticed that it said it3m instead of item so i changed the 3 to an e then i got this error
at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:313) at ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:39) at server.main(server.java:29)
i can equip the berserker ring , its in my item.java but no stat bonuses what do i do?

item.title: Item.cfg problem: berserker ring's stats dont work
item.dc:creator: @propabad propabad
item.description:
@propabad wrote:

my item.cfg for berserker ring
it3m = 6737 Berserker_Ring A_ring_reputed_to_bring_out_a_berserk_fury_in_its_wearer. 6000 6000 8000 0 0 4 0 0 0 0 4 0 0 4 0

i noticed that it said it3m instead of item so i changed the 3 to an e then i got this error

at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source)
at ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:313)
at ItemHandler.(ItemHandler.java:39)
at server.main(server.java:29)

i can equip the berserker ring , its in my item.java but no stat bonuses what do i do?
